es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter
Class Chapter

java.lang.Object
  es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.adventure.ChapterSummary
      es.eucm.eadandroid.common.data.chapter.Chapter
All Implemented Interfaces:
Described, HasTargetId, Titled, Cloneable
public class Chapter
extends ChapterSummary
implements HasTargetId

This class hold the data of a chapter in eAdventure.

Constructor Detail

Chapter

public Chapter()
Empty constructor. Sets values to null and creates empty lists.

Chapter

public Chapter(String title,
               String sceneId)
Constructor with title for the chapter. Sets empty values and creates empty lists, plus one scene.

Parameters:
title - Title for the chapter
sceneId - Identifier for the scene
